item.title: Egypt 2020-05-07
item.description: Contents Ahram Al-Masry Al-Youm Al-Youm Al-Sabe’ Mada Masr Ahram Rami Makhlouf What is the reason behind the public dispute between Makhlouf and Assad? It is said that the Russians are pressuring Assad to pay for the costs of the Russian protection of Syria, which is leading Assad to pressure his businessmen, such as Makhlouf, to provide the regime with funding. Other causes are suggested, mainly that there is a dispute between Makhlouf and Asma’ Al-Assad or that because Makhlouf is an Alawite, he may be trying to become the president.

item.title: Regional news 2020-05-05
item.description: Contents Al-Araby Al-Jadeed Al-Sharq Al-Awsat Aljazeera Alarabiya Al-Quds Al-Araby Ra’i Al-Youm Al-Araby Al-Jadeed Fears that imprisoned Saudi Princess Basma bint Saudi may have Corona Last month, the princess wrote on her twitter that she is imprisoned in Hair prison and her health is quickly deteriorating. She said he condition is critical and may lead to her death. She added that she has not received any medical assistance.

Contents Bahrain Lebanon Bahrain Al-Ayyam Terrorists may take advantage of the world’s preoccupation with the Corona pandemic… the British ambassador for “Al-Ayyam” In an interview with Al-Ayyam, the British ambassador to Bahrain said that the response of the Bahraini health system to the spread of COVID-19 was exemplary and rapid, pointing to the impressive success of the Bahraini responses especially since it only took two months.

Contents Egypt Saudi Qatar Jordan Syria Egypt Ahram One hand protects from the pandemic and the other builds the desert Throughout Egyptian history, Sinai has never received this volume of development projects… The roads, tunnels, and bridges tht are being built will change life across all of Egypt and not just Sinai… I have seen the many giant national projects, which were accomplished by the people of Egypt under the leadership of President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi during the past years, and… I did not believe that all of these projects were completed in this record time

Contents Al-Araby Al-Jadeed Al-Jazeera Al-Arabiya Sky News Arabia Al-Sharq Al-Awsat Al-Araby Al-Jadeed Corona Egypt: Doubts about the efficiency of the return-to-work plans The Egyptian government continues to rush towards a full return to service and financial activities after the end of the month of Ramadan, despite the worsening situation of the new Corona epidemic, the steady increase in the number of daily casualties… and the failure of the state to conduct random tests even in areas that witnessed high infection rates.
